animeTitle: Shingeki no Bahamut: Genesis - Short Story
otherNames: 【神撃のバハムート GENESIS】 Short story, Rage of Bahamut: Genesis - Short Story
synopsis: The short movie, labelled "Short story #1," focuses on Favaro and Kaiser between the events of the first and second series. It features Megumi Hayashibara as Favaro's mother. An episode 2 is planned.
